description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows graphics component:

1. Download and apply the latest updates relevant to your Windows version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure that your system is updated to the following build versions:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.3296
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2: 10.0.22621.3296
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2: 10.0.22000.2836
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2: 10.0.19044.4170
3. Restart your system after installation to effect changes.

**Details**:
- The updates KB5035845, KB5035853, KB5035858, and KB5035854 address the underlying issues and should be installed on all applicable systems. Update packages can be found here:
   - [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
   - [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858)
   - [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
   - [KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running a compatible version of Windows as listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
